resources.string: \tPlease enter only numbers. Non-digits will be stripped out. \n\tIf using \'Starts with\', please include the country code as well. \n\tPhone numbers will appear as +12223334445555 where 1 is country code, 222 is area code and so on. The plus sign is handled automatically.

\tThis is intended for people who know regex. \n\tType in the regex on numbers you want to block. Phone numbers comes in the form of <country_code><rest_of_numbers> with no symbols in between the digits. \n\tThis will save the raw regex and block the call based on the pattern.
